mapper.select: SELECT user_email, user_name, user_type, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(us.stack_name) FROM user_stack us WHERE us.user_email = u.user_email) AS stack_names, (SELECT sns_intro FROM sns_intro_tb sit WHERE sit.user_email = u.user_email) AS sns_intro FROM user_tb u WHERE user_email != #{login_email} AND user_type != 3

sql.if:

ELSE 0 END) DESC
